page.title: 06School Day at Wimbish
page.content: We have some breakfast and then get ready for school. In our school we wear school uniform. Some of us travel to school by bus, some go by car and others walk. School starts at 9.10.a.m. In school the teacher calls the register and then we have Assembly. After this, we have lessons such as Mathematics or English. On Wednesday mornings we go swimming and on Thursdays we have cookery. Our morning is broken up by a 15 minute playtime when we can buy tuck, but then we work again until lunch time at 12 noon. We eat our lunches, then we play with our friends or go to recorder or guitar lessons. School starts again at 1.30 p.m. We have more lessons such as craft, games or projects. Project is a chosen subject that we have to find out about. We go home at 3.40.p.m.
